title: Can I use a new texture pack on the Java Edition of Minecraft?
self_text: Yes, you can! However, you will need to download the textures from another source than what is available on the official website. For example, you can find some that have been made by people who are very good at it, and they do not look like they were designed for vanilla minecraft. If you want to use them, you may have to manually change the texture files within your installation folder.

self_text: I'm trying to build a base in survival mode, but I can't get it done.  I am playing on a realm and want to create a base for me and my friends to hang out in. If you want me to send you screenshots of the base let me know.

title: How do I create a modded server?
self_text: I want to make a Minecraft server but I don’t know how to install mods and plugins.  I've done some research on YouTube, but it seems so confusing and complicated. Is there any way to simplify the process?  Also, can you recommend any servers that are easy to use?
